review: Very good casting of music & pictures but videos  are a little laggy. Streaming from YouTube works great.
author: Ram Lissauer

review: Only ordered this product to primarily stream from tv and new websites via Chrome browser.Cons: - Setup took a few hours as one router setting was causing an issue. I ended up finding the solution on YouTube, as the Chromecast workaround was ineffective and dated. -  Streaming websites or just mirroring my laptop was choppy, low resolution, and slow. -  Resolution on youtube and netflix was far from HD quality, ironically my Roku3 on the same wireless network looks great for the same applications. - You get what you pay for with this product - Not reliable HD qualityPros: - Cheap - A quick and dirty solution for screen mirroring if performance and quality are not important. - The screen backgrounds were very cool and of high resolution, but not cool enough to justify me keeping Chromecast.
